remarks: A nonzero Hilbert lattice element less than the join of two atoms is an atom.  ( ~ atcvati analog.)  (Contributed by NM, 22-Nov-2011.)
statement:
cvrat.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
cvrat.s $e |- .< = ( lt ` K ) $.
cvrat.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
cvrat.z $e |- .0. = ( 0. ` K ) $.
cvrat.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
cvrat $p |- ( ( K e. HL /\ ( X e. B /\ P e. A /\ Q e. A ) ) -> ( ( X =/= .0. /\ X .< ( P .\/ Q ) ) -> X e. A ) ) $.
